meanings.definition: The state or quality of being permanent.
meanings.sent1: The permanences of the ancient ruins amazed the visitors.
meanings.sent2: The permanences of the mountains remind us of nature's strength.
meanings.sent3: The permanences of the stubborn stains on the carpet made the cleaning task challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like the permanences of the stars in the night sky, unwavering and constant.
meanings.sent5: The permanences of the old oak tree in the backyard symbolize the passage of time.

meanings.definition: Things that are permanent or enduring.
meanings.sent1: Family bonds are some of the most cherished permanences in life.
meanings.sent2: The permanences of traditions keep cultures alive through generations.
meanings.sent3: The permanences of his favorite childhood toy brought back nostalgic memories.
meanings.sent4: In a world of change, friendship can be a beacon of permanences.
meanings.sent5: The permanences of the ancient pyramids continue to fascinate historians and archaeologists.
